content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend and i were traveling south on hwy 32 and about to approach chickory road. it was about  8:40 in the evening and we were returning home to kenosha from a dinner date with some friends in racine. we were on my motorcycle, so we had a clear view of the night sky. i got this sensation as if someone was watching me from the sky. as i looked up into the night sky, i saw this brilliant white, yet very specific, light shining not too high in the sky. as we road for several minutes, it seemed to be either emitting more intense light or descending closer, or maybe even growing in size. there was a jet headed parallel to it, going north west, bit then hurriedly changed its course, abruptly flying west, seemingly getting as far as possible from the object. as the jet did this, the light didn't fly away, but appeared to vanish in an instant, sort of a vacuum type vanishing. throughout all of this, my girlfriend refused to look, which i thought was odd, since i didn't tell her what it was that i wanted her to witness. then it was over.
content.summary: Starlight object hovered for several minutes, then appeared to vanish in a vacuum of space.

content.detailedDescription:
my wife was dropping me off to my place of work and i had noticed something shiney in the sky. thinking it was light reflecting off of a plane i paid no mind to it. then i had looked again and it was blinking. that got my attention.
 there were approximately 4 objects in the sky and a helicopter (which i did not notice, my wife did),and the disc shaped objects were glowing. now what really freaked me out is that the objects were disappearing and reappearing almost in a slanted line from about 500 feet to almost where the 2pm sun was located. when the objects disappeared they left a shadow and appeared almost directly on top of their previous location. kind of like blinking christmas lights. i do not know how long the incident lasted because i had to go to work at 2:30pm and my wife had an appointment. but i'm sure it wasn't that long because no one at my place of work had seen the event.
 i was trying to film the objects with my cell-phone but i am so amateurish that i didn't know how to zoom in. i'm pretty sure there are some video experts that can zoom in and see the objects from the video. also i was filming directly under the sun... 
 as a note: barry m. goldwater airforce range is south of the location where the sighting had occured. this is not the only time there has been strange objects in the sky.
content.summary: Blinking lights over barry m. goldwater airforce range

content.detailedDescription:
While waiting for a tran at the airport in san francisco i noticed an object that appeared to be glowing. taking out my phone, i took the first picture.
the object appeared to be hovering. as soon as i took the first pic. the object darted to the second position. i snapped the second pic. as soon as the camera would allow, about 1 second. the object then appeared to vanish!
the time was about 9:15 pst. at the time i had no idea what it was. i just thought it might be something cool!
look at the pictures and decide for yourself.
content.summary: Photographed object at san francisco airport.

content.detailedDescription: Was driving to work with my boss. then as we came over a hill near vacaville, ca we saw 4 disc, transparent (almost cloudy in substance)objects in the sky over what seemed like would have been sacramento, ca. by the distance they were seen at they must have been huge because a plane at that distance would have looked smaller, im sure of it. my first thought was ufo and so was my bosses. then off to the west there was another disc shaped object. all were hovering. i tried to take a video of the event but when filmimg i could not get my phone camera to pick it up, bummer! as we were driving i looked up and saw an orb flying toward the other ufos and then it just dissapeard then the others followed in the disapearing act.
content.summary: Driving to sacramento, ca from vacaville, ca. 4 transparent object in a triangle formation. then another to the west. then a glowing orb above us. daytime sighting.

content.detailedDescription: Approximately 8:30pm on staten island, i was told by a friend to come outside because there is something weird flying over. i went outside and saw what looked to be a fireball (orb shaped) floating over and it appeared to be ascending and then at times it appear to descend. it was moving rather slow from our vantage point, but we really couldn't tell its direction or speed. additionally, seconds before the fireball disappeared or went out- it began to flicker on and off. perhaps the cloud cover masked the ufo as it began to rise?
content.summary: Orange fireball spotted over staten island

content.detailedDescription: I two other boys and my little brother were sleeping outside in the neighbours yard. i had fallen asleep when the two other boys shook me awake and said look up there. thats when i saw the object.There was no mistaking what the object was it was disc shaped with a dome and glowing red like red hot metal i couldnt hear any sound coming from it. i looked as thou it was decending. i know this is going to sound funny but it looked like the pizza hut logo. my feeling at the time was big deal ufos and sightings were common back then. it was visable for about 7 seconds. this object made regular passes and was seen at differant times by differant people.
content.summary: Was awoken by freinds and shown the object as we were sleeping out side.

content.detailedDescription: Looking through summer photos and spotted what ever it is in the right hand conner, strange things happen up roundball hill in honiton, lot of commotion there last night am going to check it out latter helicopters hovering around the ages last night
content.summary: What the hell is happening in honiton,uk?!?!?!

content.detailedDescription:
At approx. 12:00 a.M. arizona time i was sitting out on my patio listening to coast to coast am radio show (i do not drink alcohol or use illegal substances) when a very bright hovering and then moving object caught my eye at 35 degrees elevation ssw direction.  it was a praticaly clear (no moon light) cloudless sky and i found it very unusual because it was pulsing a little with a white/light green/light blue.  i immediately focused my binoculars on it and to my shock and surprise, it was changing shapes from a tetrahedral shape to a more oval shape and back and forth again. it ws moving slowly in a general ssw direction. other aircraft were in the sky directly before the incident which is still going on as i write this.  this is not an aircraft/balloon. i tried to video the object with my new motorola android atrix 4g cell phone but doesn't look like anything of significance showed up.  i will try to view it again after i finish this report.  this is the first time i have ever seen anything like it in my life and i am 47 years old.  i have seen plenty of meteors and lunar eclipses etc. and again this was not anything like that. could it be a low satellite?  i doubt it very much due to the object's shape-shifting phenomenon i experienced.  at one point it looked like it shot out two beams of a "laser" light and was spinning slowly in the tetrahedral form it took then. i thought at first it was a star but i quickly realized that it was moving too rapidly for it to be one, nor do i think it was a satellite because it was moving too slowly for it to be one.  i am shocked and amazed at what i saw because i never thoughy i would witness something this profound! i will upload the video in the morning since i want to go and watch this thing some more if it is still there.  thank you.  

sincerely,  [name removed/cms/tg]
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I noticed a brightly glowing tetrahedral object hovering then changing direction

content.detailedDescription: Me and my buddies were walking from rainbow lake to mcdonalds late night one night and i was in the back of the pack on my skateboard and my neck hurt from football so i looked up and was looking at the stars. i was watching a satellite drift when a light just floated out of the clouds. i though it was an airplane at first, then i decided it was a helicopter. but if it was a helicopter i would've heard it and it changed direction abruptly and violently sometimes but it was mostly carefully turning and making large sweeps to turn. so as a reasonable response i shouted "holy s''t! somethings in the sky!" my friends all looked up and were confused but then they realized it wasn't normal and someone said that's gotta be a ufo and so we had a little freak out session and were so excited to be able to say we witnessed a ufo but then a beam opened up out of the object and we started to get scared. and it hovered back and forth. the clouds were odd that night. there was a semi transparent cloud underneath the thing and then a thicker, but still hazy, cloud above it. we slowed down to a near stop and kinda got closer to eachother and the object was making a slow motion bee line and we could see the light on top of the cloud underneath it. we were afraid so we decided to get out and power walked until it made a sharp turn and then sluggishly accelerated into the cloud and then out of sight. we were constantly looking for something on the ground cause we just felt unsafe and watched. i may be in high-school. but we know what we saw and if you don't want to take this for truth don't. i cannot describe exactly where i was but it was just us on the closest road to the rim and the national forest with a ton of uninhabited homes. near a cemetery to add to the creepiness.
content.summary: Saw light in sky with a beam underneath. changed direction carefully and rapidly. could see beam on clouds.

content.detailedDescription: This is the same light that we have been seeing in the sky for a couple months now.  it flashes, and also moves in different directions, but just slightly.  observed by myself and 4 other people.  same light was in the eastern part of the sky last night, tonight it is in the east.
content.summary: Same flashing light in the sky there again.

content.detailedDescription:
At 9:55 pm approximately on monday night september 19, 2011...And while driving south at the beginning of the parkway (135)of nassau county, long island, new york from the ramp to the most of the ride, i was able to perceive as a planet like mars the size of a dime perhaps...Bigger than the other surrounding planets and stars...I thought that mars had become larger and felt surprised that mars looked bigger since i was traveling where there are little lights of electricity and little trees (the parkway is like a big bridge...) so i as i continued driving south, the driving was easily a straight line for approximately 10 minutes (or so). since the driving was manageable i was able to see more than once at my left ((north/)east of the sky of long island how the steady dome of a planet like figure (or the north of a semi circle) shined with a dim...But still noticeable light with a some what white/light greenish color and with a three tips at the south of the object...(that is how i thought it was a plane coming towards you) but there was no movement, noise or intermittent lights...I also thought it may have been a satellite...But there was no blinking lights, nor was it in motion, nor was it small enough...
as i drove i figure it may have looked like a science fiction film or cartoon (perhaps dragon ball z..) where planets are noticeable at the naked eye with partiality...It shone as if it would have been an electric plant, since the light was so focused and it did not diffuse...It was concentrated...Fixed.
i drove for ten minutes or so and as the road steered away from the south into the south west into southern state parkway...I noticed that as i drove away from its view i noticed that a small thin cloud heading north passed at the south of the view of the strange object/light...It was heading really fast as i was traveling south (opposite direction).
one of my thoughts was that it was either a new planet (big one) or a new star or a comet (since i personally thought it could not be a plane or satellite)...Since i do not "believe in extraterrestrial intelligent life" i thought it may have been a comet really far away that some have told me would be visible in october....But i think it was too early...So then i also thought would be a light from land of nyc...But the light was too east of the nyc that it probably would have been over the atlantic or even outside of the atmosphere or further...Not further than the moon. i figured it would not be a comet since at a driving distance of 8 minutes or so it was a bit to the north of me...While i still perceived it to be steady...Meaning it was close to the earth's surface....Anyways...That is what i saw...It was big enough to catch my attention and was visible long enough from me to see it more than once and wonder if there were other people who would see it...It is something i will never forget and conclude that it was either a blast of gas at great distance that would make it cold enough to stay steady and reflect a great light to last for so long or it would be something that would need further explanation by nasa...The us government or by cold science....I finished seeing it at about 10:05 pm. and wonder if i would see from home....Unfortunately i was not able to because of too many trees in my area and i had to get up early for work and was hungry. i told my family...And the coincidence of the earthquakes in guatemala raised my eyebrows as well as the reporting of similar lights at the south of usa and even one reported in another website, which referred me here.

p.S. i am color blind, i wear glasses and i was coming from an evening course (seminar fro my ma in theology and i was going home)
content.summary: Static light dim but still bright at center...No blinking lights...Looked like plane coming towards you without moving...At first looked like mars...Lasted several minutes...

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were outside with the kids watching the clouds -my daughter said she saw a star, but we didn't see any because it was still light at the time. then almost directly up, but towards the southern part of the sky we saw a star-like object moving in the sky. it followed a path behind the clouds, appeared out of the clouds shortly afterward and seemingly ascended until it was no longer visible. then we spotted another. this one went one direction, then oddly changed direction...I wouldn't say it was fast, but very unlike a plane. then four slowly came out from behind clouds settled in the northeastern part of the sky and they gathered together in a pyramid shape. it looked like a constellation because it was at this point the sky was dark enough for stars to show. the objects hovered from that point on. they didn't move at all from what i observed after that. i went inside and decided to report; i was a little shocked and excited. there were at least two planes flying during this event -we live close to cessna and the wichita airport.
content.summary: Several star-like objects moving in different directions

content.detailedDescription: Standing looking up into the sky after several airplanes had traveled southward saw this object flying at an extremely fast pace northward, several other friends were also watching the object.
content.summary: Faster than a satellite, heading in a northward direction.

content.detailedDescription:
Last night 9/19/2011 at around 9:50pm, i just happened to be sitting outside in a chair looking at the stars only for a moment, and then from the north (over my house) about 10 or so tannish/grayish colored triangular objects went from the north to south and out of my view. the objects had no lights but i could see them because they were lighter color wise than the background sky. i consider my an amateur astronomer, andi have a decent telescope, and i do look at the sky quite often, and i have never seen anything like this. after i calmed down i tried to make a mental note of what i saw. the objects looked quite similar to a stealth bomber with triangular long wings, but had no lights but i could seem them very easily kind of like the ground clutter light made them to be seen???, also no sound at all before, during or after they passed and i waited and expected to hear something but heard nothing. they weren���t that high in the sky, so i was expecting some noise.
 
anyway, i usually don't say or do anything when i may have seen something in the sky, but this time, i had an eery feeling about what i saw.

i just also saw that someone in dallas saw similar objects last night posted on this website.
content.summary: Triangular shape, no sound, no lights, looked like stealth bomber

content.detailedDescription: I was on a river cruise in shanghai and looked up and saw three circular objects with rotating lights.
content.summary: Circular objects with random color sequential lights.

content.detailedDescription:
Night (9 - 10pm) on 17th september i was out metal detecting on a field in essex, 

as i was metal detecting in a ploughed field, i looked over to the lane next to the field where my car was parked to see the police checking over my car, most probably wondering why a car was parked on its own in the middle of nowhere, at the same time i noticed over the estuary a large airplane heading in my direction above coryton oil refinery, a moments thought was that this was going to pass right over me, instead it swiftly suddenly changed direction to then disappear, i thought well thats strange, on a very clear night, so i decided to watch in the flight path it went to see if could be seen again, then it came out of nowhere again for a couple of seconds then went again for good.

i am a little uncertain of things as i was also watching the police at the same time, however, i definitely saw something that did not behave like any airplane, it seemed to be transparent except for lights either side.

i often metal detect at night and see many planes, this was not one.

this aircraft had the ability to disappear and reappear.
content.summary: Invisible airplane, lights on either wing (invisible)

content.detailedDescription: I was driving south on interstate 45 on my way to work in downtown houston, tx. while still a few miles outside of downtown, with the city skyline visible, i watched a bright red light that flashed slowly about every 2 or 3 seconds.  after the red light flashed, it was immediately followed by a fast strobe or twinkle of blueish white lights, much smaller than the red.  i thought it might be a small aircraft's beacon, or a helicopter, but the lights maintained the same brightness as it flew over the highway and off to the east horizon.  it was about as low as a helicopter would fly.  it moved west to east over the highway and continued to the east horizon.  i was driving so that's as far as i could watch it while driving.  there was also one of those beacon towers with the red lights and flashing light on top off on the east horizon, it seemed to stop near it.  it flew faster than a helicopter and lower than a plane.  the red light was very bright, and never changed intensity from the different angles i viewed it at as it moved away. it was about 5:35 am and still dark out.
content.summary: Bright flashing red/blueish white light over i-45 near downtown houston

content.detailedDescription: I was at my apartment in canton and walked out to my car with my girlfriend to go to the store at 9pm saturday, september 17.  we were looking up at the stars and i noticed an object that also looked like a star moving from the northwest to the southeast.  it was directly over top of us moving towards the southeast when it went from being a dim moving star-like object to a extremely bright pulsating light- almost like a meteor or asteroid when it skips off the atmosphere, but this object continued on it's way and suddenly it dimmed back down to it's original light intensity, continuing southeast towards the metro airport where it suddenly disappeared in the sky.  the sky was crystal clear that night, a decent amount of stars were out for living in the city and this object was no satellite or plane.  there were several planes in other locations in the sky to reference that this object was something unknown.  it didn't have any specific details, other than seeming star or orb-like in appearance.  the sighting only lasted about 1 minute at the most.  quite an amazing event to witness!
content.summary: Star-like object moving from nnw to sse, light intensified overhead then got dimmer and headed southeast and then disappeared out of thin air.

content.detailedDescription: I just hung up from a call with a friend of mine, when approx. 1-2 minutes later she called me back frantically saying to go outside that i would see "them". she witnessed 3 ships/lights in the sky above her home headed toward the direction of my home, which is 2-3 blocks away from hers. as i ran out the door, i clearly saw 1 star-like light with a "visible" form to it emerging from over my rooftop. it seemed to be transparent but i saw that it had a chevrom shape to it. it was literally only about 100 ft. above the rooftop. i followed it for a minute until it was out of sight. it was moving at a slow and steady pace, slow enough for me to walk at a faster pace up my 30ft. driveway to follow it. since july 4th this year there have been several people in my area that have witnessed these same type of craft, usually heading north, at a pretty regular pace. i would say that total there might be 10-15 sightings since july 4th. this was definitely the most significant to date. i di not witness the other two craft that my friend saw. she descibed the same thing that i saw. she said that one was in front and headed towards my home while the other two flew right next to each other at approx. 30-50 ft. apart in a westward direction. the first coming to my area would have been going eastward.
content.summary: Star-like light with visible form

content.detailedDescription: While camping on the caddo river in glenwood,arkansas, i observed two lights on the other side of the river,coming down the hill toward the river.They appeared to be car or truck headlights,white and evenly spaced. as they got closer to the river, i observed the 2 lights change to 3 lights. as these lights approached the river,my view was slightly blocked by a row of trees,but i could still make out their direction very close to the river.As these lights appeared to enter the river,they changed from 3 bright lights to 6 much smaller lights and changed from white to red.The lights were coming down the river toward a bend in the river about 50 yards away from me. as the lights made the bend in the river, i observed these lights to be some sort headgear being worn by 3 small, maybe 3 1/2 to 4 feet tall beings.They were covered in a sort of silver suit and had helmets on which there lights were attached-1 on either side- to their helmets.They were walking 3 abreast, and the 1 in the middle had what appeared to be a sort of wane which, as he stuck it in the water would make a sort of buzzing sound.The 3 beings were talking but no language i could understand.As they came closer,i got up and approahed them,but when i got within maybe 20-30 yards from them,they turned back up the river and quickly disappeared. i have no explanation as to what these "things" were or what they were doing.
content.summary: Witnessed 3 beings in silver suits

content.detailedDescription:
I stopped at the stop light on beck and 12 mile road, waiting for it to turn green, i noticed 3 white lights slightly to the left of the light and over the parking lot to the office complex i work at. i watched it as i turned in and stopped, rolled the car windows down and there was no sound at all coming from the object. it was huge. it was moving fairly slowly going slightly south east.
the sky around the object was still dark (6:18 in the morning) but still bluish, the area between the 3 lights was solid black. i tried to find my phone to attempt to take a picture, but it was in my purse, when i finally found it and looked back up, the object was too far away. when i first observed it, i knew it was not a plane, the lights were of a white that was different than any light i have seen. i knew i was seeing something spectacular and was excited, yet a little scared too. i went and bought a camera to keep handy just in case i get lucky again. there was quite a bit of traffic, so i hope someone else sees this and reports also.
content.summary: Black triangle in sky over parking lot in wixom mi.

content.detailedDescription: Noticed a very bright light through the window and at about 30 degrees above the horizon in the eastern sky (almost due east).  as it wasn't moving, nor were red lights blinking, i knew it wasn't a plane, so got my sister who said, "that is weird," and asked for the binoculars.  we stood on our loading dock that is raised some four feet above the patio so as not to have any obstruction from trees or power lines.  we wondered if mars wasn't particularly bright--but this was far too bright (and not red) for a planet.  we managed to get the binoculars adjusted and my sister described what she saw:  "i really don't know how to describe it.  it looks organic.  it's got a swirl of smoke or mist around it.  and it's like it's being eclipsed by a round object."  i snatched the binoculars and managed to find it also.  the best description i can offer is that it appeared to be a gold/copper colored yin or yang symbol with swirls of mist on the outside.  i saw what my sister meant by the eclipse, as that was what was creating the yin/yang look.  to me it appeared that the entire visible surface was stippled with lights or had a very pocked, though highly shiny gold surface.  the object then blinked out for perhaps two seconds, then was back but some three degrees lower in the sky.  (we were using the vastly scientific method of determining movement by guaging it by the electric line coming into our building.  most of the time we were looking at it, it was directly over the lowest sag in the line.  then suddently it was a good deal higher than.  another blink out and it was below the line.)  we called my sister's daughter who deemed it a planet on a glance outside.  we watched it for a while longer, then individually drew pictures of what we had seen.  shortly after 10:30 p.M. the object was still visible in the eastern sky, and still in the same location.
content.summary: Through window observed light too bright to be a planet, but not moving.  called my sister, we went outside with binoculars.  could see it, but looked liked nothing we'd seen before.

content.detailedDescription: I had just finished branding a new horse at a neighbors ranch approximately 2 miles to the north and was riding home. i had my horse saddled and was leading the new gelding. as we turned off the county road and into our drive i spotted two bright, glowing orbs comming out of the hills to the east at a distance of one and one half miles. they came directly at us at an incredible rate of speed taking just a few seconds to cover the distance. they were side by side as they passed just a few feet from the north wall of our home. they stopped instantly at the corner of the north and west walls. they paused just a fraction of a second, broke to my right with one following the other. they reached the south and west corner, angled at about a 45 degree up to the middle of the house, angled down again at a 45 degree angle, got back to their orginal path and retreated back into the hills at speeds that defy discription. when they got to the corner of the house i remember shouting'what the hell is this!' both the horse i was riding and the one i was leading are what we describe as 'bomb proof', meaning that they are dead broke and never offer to buck. when those two objects, about the size of volley balls zoomed around the front of the house, both horses reared up, pawed the air and whinied in a total panic. i was able to stay on and contol them but they were clearly frightened....As was i. the next day i rode through my pastures and got permission to ride through my neighbors to the east. i never found anything like scorched grass but there are several square miles of open range  and rolling hills.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Two glowing orbs on a straight-line path approached my home at a great rate of speed. they paused, moved south, up, down, back to the north and headed back east

content.detailedDescription:
What can i say i was out taking photos in honiton in devon, did'nt see it at the time got the film developed and what you can see in the top right is what i seem to have captured on film! any ideas???

imaged scanned in.
content.summary: Seen later in photo 120 film

content.detailedDescription:
El 24/6/2011 una luz naranja, venia hacia mi posicion, al princiopio pense que era una avion y no mire, al ver que aquella luz se hacia mas grande e iva mas veloz de lo normal, pense que era un avion que se iva a estrellar, pero al ya observar el acontecimiento, la luz se paro en frente en el aire a unos 200 metros, de altura, brillando entre roja y naranjada, y en vez de venir directo hacia mi fue en direccion paralela,lentamente, cuando recorrio 500m, empezo un ascenso continuo hacia el cielo, de forma rapida y sin parar, estuve mirando y durante mas de 5 minutos estuvo subiendo volviendose cada vez mas peque���������������������������������������������������������������������������������������������������������������������������������������������������������������������������������������������������������������������������������������������������a la luz hasta desaparecer totalmente de mi vista. se que no era ni un avion ni otra maquina fabricada por el hombre, nada es capaz de volar como un avion, girar como helicoptero,mantenerse en el aire como una mosca, y subir hacia la estratosfera como un cohete a la vez.

gracias y perdon por el espa���������������������������������������������������������������������������������������������������������������������������������������������������������������������������������������������������������������������������������������������������ol, pero no entiendo el ingles.
content.summary: Objeto volador barcelona

content.detailedDescription:
I was facing south while investigating a vehicle accident on interstate 278 ( i am a police officer) when a bright green object with a trail appeared at 20 degs +/- above the horizon and fell at a 45 deg angle down and to the right (as i observed it).  it vanished at about 10 degs above the horizon and it lasted 5 seconds or less.   it was very similar to a military flare but nothing like a firework.  however i saw it appear and lose altitude then disappear.  if i saw it eject from the ground i would have believed it to be a flare or even a fire work but it's appearance mid air was odd.  no aircraft were low enough to emit it otherwise i would have thought it a flare like one ejected from military aircraft to distract anti air missiles.(however unlikely over new york city)

would have thought it was a meteor but being green and moving fast and it's size ruled that out.  it was too large for a shooting star.  if assuming the object was the size of a standard military flare i would estimate it's distance at under 500 feet away.  i am prior military and have seen many flares.  was it an alien... doubtful.  was it unidentified and flying?  yes
content.summary: Bright green light similar to a military flare 20 deg above horizon falling at 45 deg and vanishing about 10 digs above horizon

content.detailedDescription:
An interesting note: 
i am from wetumpka, al.  we do have a military base nearby, housing the air war college no less.  over the years, i have observed a number of times what appears to be ball lightning and an excessive number of meteorite impacts within this county and in a particular area just south of millbrook, al.  this area also contains a large meteorite impact crater.  it is miles wide.  i live on one of its hills (300 feet) that was created in the impact.  it was created i believe 80 million years ago.
(url moved to fi box) cms 09/20/11 09:46 cst flg
we get meteor explosions here every few years and see one or more make it to the ground probably as frequently as every year.  i need to note that while this area is somewhat rural, there is a lot of light pollution.  you cannot see the galaxy from here, for example, but you can see the major stars quite well.  so this is an urban and suburban area for most of the eastern i-85 area to georgia.

the report:
several times over the years and again this year, i have seen what appears to be a small, maybe sub-car sized object, a sphere, come darting in, hovering for a moment, lighting up a spot on the ground, then flying off in the general, but not exact same direction that it had come from.  it is orange in color and lit up like the whole thing is just a little light.  its luminosity is pale, not bright.  they only appear at night.  one night this year, i cannot remember exactly when and i think i reported it to another ufo site, i saw it again.  it was off in the distance as i was driving home from work late, say 12:30am.  it was bright enough to distinguish at several miles distance and it appeared to be coming closer. thinking about how pale it was when i got close to it, it must have been very bright and reducing brightness as it approached.  i was driving west.  as i turned to the north, it came as close to the highway as the trees (us-231) and then turned north to parallel the highway.  i watched it through the trees until i lost it about a mile north.  as i was driving just about a mile more from there, it darted out from the tree line and crossed the highway.  i was no more than a few hundred feet away at this point.  it was at tree top level, far too close and small to be any craft or helicopter, etc.  it went over into an empty field, slowing, speeding up, moving around a little, then it lit up the ground for a few seconds with a regular looking while light, then went back the way it came.  the field in question is completely benign and an abandoned lot that was skimmed off with a pond for sale.  i told my mom and she said at the time that she had seen it several times.  i had seen it years before, and another time at our old house not far from there in montgomery, where i had a much more interesting encounter.

in montgomery, 2007, 3am, this same orb (one looking just like it) was moving by at several hundred or thousand feet very slowly from south to north and nearby our house.  i thought it was a satellite or high altitude plane as this is a flight line and we do have an air force base nearby.  as i watched the light, it moved on beyond the tree line and out of view.  i knew it didn't match anything i had seen before and it just seemed to be so high for some reason.  higher than any planes actually that had come over.  moments later, it returned slowly at lower altitude and stopped (still thousands of feet high it appeared).  i had a flashlight and did flash to it several times.  after a few moments, it moved on again, then stopped as i was flashing.  i was wondering if it sensed me, so i stopped flashing at it.  finally, it moved on and did not return.  i went back to bed.  the next day, it returned about the same time and just crossed the sky and disappeared.  i didn't flash at it.  another time at this house, i saw a daytime ufo.  i was sitting in my room at 4 in the afternoon on a cloudy day.  i looked up from my bed just in time to glance a blue and black ufo through the slits of the blinds on the window.  it had several lights on it, blue, red, green.  it was so low coming over the treetops down the court and behind the houses down the street that i thought it was going to dive in and hit the house.  it was like a saucer from the profile, head-on view, but that can be easily misinterpreted as quickly as this happened.  it could have been more like a plane, but not a copter.  there was no sound and it was moving very fast.  near to there, my mom and sister and a family friend from out of town have reported nighttime black triangles.  anyway, i darted from my room and out the back door just in time to see it go down behind the trees and out of view.  through the trees and with the close proximity, i would say it was as big as a c-130.  we have those come over time and again.  however, it was no c-130.  it was black, blue stripe, lights, and too compact to be a plane with wings, and again, the silence made it plane weird.  another thing, this thing had to have crashed as steep the angle and low to the ground as it was, but there was no crash, and i went to the area by bike to make sure.  nothing was there.  this thing had only inches to miss the trees for me to see it over our short yard through my window with such a small field of view.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Small orb, very close, clear, treetops, hovering, darting, seen it before, others have seen it too...

content.detailedDescription:
this ufo was viewed by my boyfriend on 09/18/2011-that sunday morning. he first started viewing the ufo at about 6 a.M. from his place of employment. he has a job that allows him to be outside and able to look at the sky. the entire viewing lasted approximately 44 minutes. he was looking in a south-east direction and he saw a bright, shining object. at first he thought it was one of the few stars that was still visible around daybreak, but as he scanned the sky there were no other stars visible, even when he looked up with his binoculars. 
     he grabbed those binoculars to get a closer look and as he focused, he saw what looked to be a bright, metallic and diamond shaped object. the side that was facing east was getting the most sunlight and the object was showing an illuminated rim with a bright glint and a hot spot. as i mentioned before, the object was diamond-shaped (meaning traditional diamond, and not baseball field diamond shaped)and it remained stationary during the entire time that it was visible. after my boyfriend got off of work he kept checking the skyline to see if it had moved, but it didn't.
     at around 6:44 a.M., the object itself had still not moved, but a smaller object was seen separating from the larger,diamond-shaped object. the separated object was heading in a south-east direction. after that, my boyfriend couldn't find it anymore.
content.summary: Star-like ufo

content.detailedDescription: On sept 12, 2011, my sister and i were driving through amarillo on a cloudy evening on our way back home to california.  my sister saw something in the sky very big and very bright going through the cloud cover.  she grabbed her phone and took a picture of it.  there is a reflection of the flash of the camera on the glass of the window, she was driving and only had one hand available so she didn;t have time to roll the window down. we didn't know what it was but it was not a plane.  when we looked at the picture we both we stunned at what we were looking at.  it was dark with some thick cloud cover that was visible but there were no airplanes and absolutely nothing giving off any reflection on the window.  these lights were in the sky outide the car up above us passing through the clouds. very big and very bright.  we are still baffled..
content.summary: While driving through amarillo texas in the evening my sister and i witnessed something going in and out of the clouds. my sister captured a photo on her phone through the window.

content.detailedDescription:
Hello,

twice in the last month as i have been driving north on interstate-5 between the del mar race track & encinitas, ca (san diego county) i noticed a stationary object in the sky - i would say at first i thought it was a private jet heading west, just over land fall close to solana beach i would say it was also at a pretty high elevation. it was a sunny day with blue skies & some cloud.

as there are several marine bases in the county (specifically coronado, pendleton & miramar) i then wondered if it was either some kind of military aircraft, blimp/balloon or a private plane from carlsbad airport. as my grandfather was in the raf i have always liked spotting military planes & helicopters with my mum & brother - and especially living close to camp pendleton when driving near oceanside & the base you often see pilots in training with helicopters & jets running  up and down the coast. 

what caught my eye specifically about this one was that the object was completely white and looked almost like a paper plane at first glance (because of its white appearance), upon looking again the basic outline looked like two upside down, but connected pyramid-type shapes. the object on both occasions did not appear to be moving, as i kept expecting it to get smaller into the distance with perhaps a jet stream as it flew out over the ocean. i ascertained it was not a military craft because of its bright white appearance. i also then noticed it appeared to be 'hovering' or just suspended in the sky with no visible sign of any emissions or propulsion. 

the traffic flow was reasonably light because it was around midday/1pm - so i kept an eye on it as best i could because i was confused as to why it wasn't moving & what it could be. i distinctly kept an eye on it for several miles and only after i passed a bluff (by del mar heights rd) i lost sight of it for a few seconds, and when i got a clear view of the coastline again the object disappeared from the sky. i thought nothing i know of in aviation can jet off that fast without leaving a trail surely??

again last week on the 14th i saw the same shaped object again as i was driving north in i-5, i can't recall if i saw it in the same area of sky but it seemed to be in the sky around del mar/solana beach area... again it was not moving and disappeared after a few miles. i know for 100% that it was not a cloud formation, as the outline was very clearly defined in my eyes. it was also a relatively nice day with blue skies, this is what caught my eye in the first place - the white shape outlined but the blue sky.

the first time i saw it i was curious and surprised, as it was very unusual to me - sadly i can't recall the exact date. the second time i was like no way there it is again!! and tried not to take my eyes off it, but as i was driving on the freeway had to be careful also. i mentioned it over the phone to my brother also because i wanted to see what he thought it might of been. 

it wasn't until i read on (url remove to fi box) cms 09/20/11 00:19 cst flg about the notre dame game being disrupted by an almost identical object sighted & then again this article  - 

[link moved to additional evidence section/cms/tg]

- that made me want to contribute what i have seen in this area recently. i have never before seen anything like this, and although i believe we cannot be the only intelligent life in the universe have never actively read or researched "ufo" sightings.

unless this was some kind of secret military machine i know exactly what i saw was not normal. i am of sound mind, body & vision.

i hope this helps to add to your sightings & research.

similar to this video (which was also filmed in san diego county) only what i witnessed was in the sky for longer period of time & the shape was more pronounced with the two triangular 'peaks' (not seen in this clip but wanted to portray the contrast of white/blue)- 

[link moved to additional evidence section/cms/tg]

uploaded picture below doesn't quite depict what i saw, but again is general idea again. 

**for question also in the area - i have checked helicopter, planes & balloons because although i did not see any of these on the days in question, they are known to be active in that area as a matter of course.
content.summary: Have twice observed white craft-like object hovering in the sky whilst driving north on i-5 between del mar & carlsbad
